'''Square Yumemiru Stool''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Square Yumemiru Stool is obtainable from the [[World Quest]] ''[[Tatara Tales: The Last Act]]''.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Yumemiru Wood = 6
|Iron Chunk = 2
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Yumemiru Wood;Iron Chunk
}}
